p: Bernatonienė, J.; Pudžiuvelytė, L.; Jurevičius, J.; Mačianskienė, R.; Šimonytė, S. Elsholtzia ciliata essential oil extract as antiarrhythmic drug. WO Patent; Application date: 6 April 2018 = Extrait d’huile essentielle d’Elsholtzia ciliata comme médicament antiarythmique/Lithuanian University of Health Sciences. WO/2019/193400, 10 October 2019.
